summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Seattle Public Utilities' reservoir burying program; removing restrictions that limit spending of appropriations made in the 2004 Adopted Budget for burying the Maple Leaf, West Seattle, Beacon South, Myrtle and Roosevelt reservoirs; establishing a new schedule for implementation of individual reservoir burying projects; and amending Seattle Public Utilities' 2004-2009 Capital Improvement Program to reflect this new schedule.
